thread.title: Ex-Russian spy poisoned by his own front door

title: Ex-Russian spy poisoned by his own front door
text:
Ex-Russian spy poisoned by his own front door 4:56am EDT - 01:05 
Russian former double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter were poisoned with a military-grade nerve toxin that had been left on the front door of their home in England. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian former double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter were poisoned with a military-grade nerve toxin that had been left on the front door of their home in England. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J0fCzg
